# scrollRangeToVisible(_:)

**Instance Method**

Scrolls the receiver in its enclosing scroll view so the first characters of `aRange` are visible.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func scrollRangeToVisible(_ range: NSRange)
```
title: scrollRangeToVisible(_:)
